name: LETS PLAY ONE
description:
A video game collector discovers the original VHS tape of the very first lets play! However something is different about this tape. Moving backwards REWINDS the tape and moving forward fast forwards. 

AD for left and right and Space for jumping. ESC to pause. Test controls on the interactive start screen!

This is my first ever game and it is shorter than what i wanted, but i think it works as a little exploration of the concept.

Note: Download for best experience, online version not playtested, negative pitch does not work in webgl so sound does not play whilst rewinding.
